privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: Data Collection
privacy.section1.content: We collect your email address for authentication and the documents you upload for analysis.
privacy.section2.title: Data Usage
privacy.section2.item1: Your documents are NOT used to train AI models
privacy.section2.item2: Documents are only processed to provide the chat service
privacy.section2.item3: We do not share your data with third parties
privacy.section3.title: Data Storage
privacy.section3.content: Documents are encrypted at rest and automatically deleted after 30 days of inactivity.
privacy.section4.title: Your Rights
privacy.section4.content: You can delete your documents at any time. Contact us to request full account deletion.
privacy.section5.title: Contact
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1.title: Service Description
terms.section1.content: DocTalk provides AI-powered document analysis. You upload PDFs and can ask questions about their content.
terms.section2.title: User Responsibilities
terms.section2.content: You are responsible for the content you upload. Do not upload illegal or harmful content.
terms.section3.title: Disclaimer
terms.section3.content: AI responses may contain errors. Verify important information independently.
terms.section4.title: Changes
terms.section4.content: We may update these terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.
